meanings.definition: The state or quality of being conducive.
meanings.sent1: The conducivenesses of the environment helped the plants grow.
meanings.sent2: The conducivenesses of teamwork led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent3: The conducivenesses of the picnic area made everyone want to have lunch there.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude created a conducivenesses that spread to others around her.
meanings.sent5: The conducivenesses of the music festival made it a memorable experience for all attendees.

meanings.definition: The ability to promote or contribute to a desired result.
meanings.sent1: His conducivenesses in negotiations always led to favorable outcomes.
meanings.sent2: The conducivenesses of regular exercise can improve overall health.
meanings.sent3: The conducivenesses of the recipe made it a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's conducivenesses in the classroom inspired students to excel.
meanings.sent5: The conducivenesses of hard work eventually pays off in success.
